application_details.lead_developer_company_name: LBRUT Director Of Social Services And Housing

description:
Demolition of existing buildings. Redevelopment of No. 189 Waldegrave Road (Block A) and reduction of commercial floorspace to increase width of site access road and to create one ground floor commercial unit and 3 no. one-bedroom residential apartment.  
 Erection of Block B (three storey residential block) and erection of Block C (part three storey part two-storey residential block) comprising 15 no. residential apartments (8 x one bedroom and 7 x two-bedroom C3 units). 
Change of use of rear parcel of land from light industrial to residential
Creation of a disabled car parking space on the Waldegrave Road frontage. erection of cycle storage and recycling structure; landscaping.
decision_conditions:
1. Commuted sum Calculation Pro-forma
2. Construction Management Statement
3. Sustainable Construction Checklist (use pro-forma)
4. National Water Standards Statement
5. Play and Child Occupancy Assessment
6. Public open space assessment
7. Playing fields and sport facilities assessment
8. Residential Standards Statement
9. Health Impact Assessment 
10. Inclusive Access Statement
11. Resend accomodation schedule as doc unopenable.
